headline: Is Southwest Airlines (LUV) Turning Austin Into a Test Case for Its Next-Gen Network Strategy?
summary: Southwest Airlines has announced plans to open a new crew base at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport in March 2026, adding more than 2,000 pilot, flight attendant, and support roles, alongside new leisure routes and a planned recurring training facility for flight attendants. This expansion cements Austin as a key operations hub and highlights how Southwest is reshaping its network and workforce to support long-term efficiency and service upgrades, including enhanced cabin and seating...

headline: Goldman Sachs Is Bullish On The Boeing Company (BA)
summary: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is among the 12 Best Performing Dow Stocks in 2025.
